changeSet.author: Paul Maksimovich
changeSet.sql: create or replace view rollup_dataset_relations as select d1.resource_name as primary_dataset, rm1.name as name, rm1.soql as soql, (select array_agg(d2.resource_name) secondary_datasets from rollup_relationship_map rrm2 join copy_map c2 on rrm2.referenced_copy_system_id = c2.system_id join dataset_map d2 on c2.dataset_system_id = d2.system_id where rrm2.rollup_system_id = rm1.system_id) from rollup_map rm1 join copy_map c1 on rm1.copy_system_id = c1.system_id join dataset_map d1 on c1.dataset_system_id = d1.system_id;
